fields.title: Magic The Gathering
fields.description: A standard game of Magic involves two or more players who are engaged in a battle acting as powerful wizards, known as Planeswalkers.

fields.title: California Rummy
fields.description: Shanghai Rummy is played with multiple decks of 54 standard playing cards, including the Jokers. Two decks are required for a game of up to four players.

fields.title: Mr. Natural
fields.description: Mr. Natural is a Push Your Luck dice game for as many players as can sit around a table, played with six six-sided dice, in which the object is being the first player to score 10,000 points.
